alert.note: Alert for Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 4:00AM AKST until January 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Winter Storm Warning. Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
